trans-unit.source: Converting WDCML to Markdown for Open Publishing
trans-unit.target: Converting WDCML to Markdown for Open Publishing

trans-unit.source: This topic describes how to convert WDCML to Markdown that validates and renders correctly in the MSDN Open Publishing environment.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes how to convert WDCML to Markdown that validates and renders correctly in the MSDN Open Publishing environment.

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to do this is by using the built-in support in the cbx build command.
trans-unit.target: The preferred way to do this is by using the built-in support in the cbx build command.

trans-unit.source: Here's how:
trans-unit.target: Here's how:

trans-unit.source: Go to [IDWeb](https://idweb/identitymanagement/aspx/groups/AllGroups.aspx) and ensure that you are a member of the MSDN Reporting SG for your domain.
trans-unit.target: Go to [IDWeb](https://idweb/identitymanagement/aspx/groups/AllGroups.aspx) and ensure that you are a member of the MSDN Reporting SG for your domain.

trans-unit.source: You may need to wait up to 24 hours for permissions to propagate.
trans-unit.target: You may need to wait up to 24 hours for permissions to propagate.

trans-unit.source: Install the latest release of [ Pandoc](https://github.com/jgm/pandoc/releases).
trans-unit.target: Install the latest release of [ Pandoc](https://github.com/jgm/pandoc/releases).

trans-unit.source: Pandoc is updated periodically, so if it's been a while since you installed it, consider upgrading.
trans-unit.target: Pandoc is updated periodically, so if it's been a while since you installed it, consider upgrading.

trans-unit.source: A recent fix improved table rendering, for example.
trans-unit.target: A recent fix improved table rendering, for example.

trans-unit.source: By default, Pandoc installs to `c:\Users\<alias>\AppData\Local\Pandoc\`, which is added to your PATH.
trans-unit.target: By default, Pandoc installs to `c:\Users\<alias>\AppData\Local\Pandoc\`, which is added to your PATH.

trans-unit.source: Do an `sd sync`.
trans-unit.target: Do an `sd sync`.

trans-unit.source: Use `cbx msdn markdown` to build your project into .md files.
trans-unit.target: Use `cbx msdn markdown` to build your project into .md files.

trans-unit.source: After the regular cbx build, you will see two passes with progress bars.
trans-unit.target: After the regular cbx build, you will see two passes with progress bars.

trans-unit.source: The first is a fast pass to change .md formatting to match OP requirements.
trans-unit.target: The first is a fast pass to change .md formatting to match OP requirements.

trans-unit.source: The second is the A keyword conversion to URLs, which takes significantly longer.
trans-unit.target: The second is the A keyword conversion to URLs, which takes significantly longer.

trans-unit.source: The whole conversion can take up to an hour for a project containing 1500 topics.
trans-unit.target: The whole conversion can take up to an hour for a project containing 1500 topics.

trans-unit.source: If the database pass fails, you will see: Error connecting to db server.
trans-unit.target: If the database pass fails, you will see: Error connecting to db server.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that you have perms on the MSDN Reporting SG.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that you have perms on the MSDN Reporting SG.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes database access can be problematic.
trans-unit.target: Sometimes database access can be problematic.

trans-unit.source: If you can't connect, try again a couple hours later.
trans-unit.target: If you can't connect, try again a couple hours later.

trans-unit.source: PROTIP: On rare occasions (ask Jason), you may need to update the local version of `convert-keywords.ps1` with the fully qualified name of the reporting server: reporting.mtps.glbdns2.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: PROTIP: On rare occasions (ask Jason), you may need to update the local version of `convert-keywords.ps1` with the fully qualified name of the reporting server: reporting.mtps.glbdns2.microsoft.com.

trans-unit.source: Manual Conversion
trans-unit.target: Manual Conversion

trans-unit.source: If you have problems with the automation, please send a bug report to DDPUB.
trans-unit.target: If you have problems with the automation, please send a bug report to DDPUB.

trans-unit.source: The following steps are what the first pass above does.
trans-unit.target: The following steps are what the first pass above does.

trans-unit.source: They are listed here for posterity.
trans-unit.target: They are listed here for posterity.

trans-unit.source: Fix links as follows:
trans-unit.target: Fix links as follows:

trans-unit.source: Replace .htm link suffixes with .md, for in-project targets, for example:
trans-unit.target: Replace .htm link suffixes with .md, for in-project targets, for example:

trans-unit.source: Replace A keywords with URLs, for example:
trans-unit.target: Replace A keywords with URLs, for example:

trans-unit.source: Remove In This Section links at the top
trans-unit.target: Remove In This Section links at the top

trans-unit.source: Switch references to upper case Images directory to images:
trans-unit.target: Switch references to upper case Images directory to images:

trans-unit.source: Remove any %20 in URLs if they exist:
trans-unit.target: Remove any %20 in URLs if they exist:

trans-unit.source: If See Also section is present, prepend asterisks to create bulleted list.
trans-unit.target: If See Also section is present, prepend asterisks to create bulleted list.

trans-unit.source: If existing, delete second occurrence of local target string:
trans-unit.target: If existing, delete second occurrence of local target string:

trans-unit.source: Update embedded video links from: `![]()` to look like this:
trans-unit.target: Update embedded video links from: `![]()` to look like this:

trans-unit.source: **Note**: JasGro to follow up on video plans and correct URL
trans-unit.target: **Note**: JasGro to follow up on video plans and correct URL

trans-unit.source: Remove initial span so that OP creates correct topic title for text on browser tab:
trans-unit.target: Remove initial span so that OP creates correct topic title for text on browser tab:

trans-unit.source: Remove nested parenthetical version selector (v=vs.85, e.g.) from links:
trans-unit.target: Remove nested parenthetical version selector (v=vs.85, e.g.) from links:

trans-unit.source: (Hardware team only) For mailto links, replace nested parentheses with %28, %29: `[Send comments about this topic to Microsoft](mailto:wsddocfb@microsoft.com?subject=Documentation%20feedback%20[VsDriver\vsdriver]:%20Analyzing%20a%20Driver%20Using%20Code%20Analysis%20and%20Verification%20Tools%20%20RELEASE:%20(9/30/2015)&body=...` Topics that contain parentheses in the topic title also cause additional parentheses in the mailto link:
trans-unit.target: (Hardware team only) For mailto links, replace nested parentheses with %28, %29: `[Send comments about this topic to Microsoft](mailto:wsddocfb@microsoft.com?subject=Documentation%20feedback%20[VsDriver\vsdriver]:%20Analyzing%20a%20Driver%20Using%20Code%20Analysis%20and%20Verification%20Tools%20%20RELEASE:%20(9/30/2015)&body=...` Topics that contain parentheses in the topic title also cause additional parentheses in the mailto link:

trans-unit.source: Remove extra carriage returns that occur after a **Note** inside a numbered list item, because it causes OP to start numbering again from 1.
trans-unit.target: Remove extra carriage returns that occur after a **Note** inside a numbered list item, because it causes OP to start numbering again from 1.

trans-unit.source: Leave one blank line remaining.
trans-unit.target: Leave one blank line remaining.

trans-unit.source: Remove copyright line:
trans-unit.target: Remove copyright line:

trans-unit.source: Change any image file suffixes to lower case, e.g., *.png not *.PNG.
trans-unit.target: Change any image file suffixes to lower case, e.g., *.png not *.PNG.

trans-unit.source: Post-markdown conversion steps
trans-unit.target: Post-markdown conversion steps

trans-unit.source: Create TOC.md in parent directory.
trans-unit.target: Create TOC.md in parent directory.
